General.Name: Kirloskar Industries Limited
General.Description: Kirloskar Industries Limited manufactures and sells iron castings in India. The company generates and sells wind-power electricity through seven windmills with total installed capacity of 5.6 megawatts in Maharashtra; owns lands and buildings, and apartments and offices; and invests in properties and securities. In addition, it engages in real estate activities; and manufacturing steel and seamless tubes. The company was formerly known as Kirloskar Oil Engines Limited and changed its name to Kirloskar Industries Limited in March 2010. Kirloskar Industries Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Pune, India.
